sentences.en: Driven beyond endurance, they led the villagers to arm themselves and prepare for action.
sentences.cn: 他们忍无可忍, 领导乡亲们拿起武器准备行动.

sentences.en: Goaded beyond endurance, she turned on him and hit out.
sentences.cn: 她被气得忍无可忍，于是转身向他猛击。

sentences.en: He showed remarkable endurance throughout his illness.
sentences.cn: 他在整个生病期间表现出非凡的忍耐力。

sentences.en: He used to astound his friends with feats of physical endurance.
sentences.cn: 过去，他表现出来的惊人耐力常让朋友们大吃一惊。

sentences.en: I left Korea impressed by the courage and endurance of its people.
sentences.cn: 我离开朝鲜时,心中念念不忘它的人民的勇敢和坚毅精神.

sentences.en: Long - distance race is won by the runner with the greatest endurance.
sentences.cn: 有非凡耐力的选手才能赢得 长跑 比赛的冠军.

sentences.en: She reached the end of endurance.
She was pushed beyond her powers of endurance.
The exercise obviously will improve strength and endurance.
sentences.cn: 这种锻炼会明显改善体力，增加耐力。

sentences.en: The limit of Russian endurance was reached.
sentences.cn: 俄国人的忍耐力到了极限.

sentences.en: The marathon is a test of endurance.
sentences.cn: 马拉松赛跑是对耐力的考验。

sentences.en: The new breed of walking holidays puts the emphasis on enjoyment, not endurance.
sentences.cn: 这种新型的徒步旅行假日重在愉悦身心，而不是为了锻炼耐力。

sentences.en: The recruits were put through a week of grueling endurance tests.
sentences.cn: 新兵要接受为期一周艰苦的耐力测试。

sentences.en: The recruits were put through a week of gruelling endurance tests.

sentences.en: This endurance made old Earnshaw furious, when he discovered his son persecuting the poor, fatherless child, as he called him.
sentences.cn: 当老恩萧发现他的儿子这样虐待他所谓的可怜的孤儿时, 这种逆来顺受使老恩萧冒火了.

sentences.en: This irritated Scarlett almost beyond endurance.
sentences.cn: 这使得思嘉大为不满,几乎到了难以忍受的地步.
